title: Own all champions, did not get Mystery Skin for Ocean Week
body: Just wondering if there is a delay for players who own all the champs, to get their mystery skin. I have received my mystery champ on my other account. Thanks

replies.body:
Yo I'm confused, I do not have all of the champions in the game and I just received a mystery skin from Riot.
Why did I not receive a champion?

Hey ServerLord,

They are distributing the gift in waves, so most likely it's just that this account hasn't been checked yet. http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/LryNggNH-ocean-week-mystery-champion-update

-DTN
